title: 'Skinnylicious' vanilla cake
description: Mich's 'skinnylicious' vanilla cake is fat-free  and dairy-free, yet doesn't compromise on flavour. This cake should be eaten on the day it is made.Equipment: you will need a sugar thermometer and a blowtorch
ingredients: 400g/14oz fresh or frozen berries, such as strawberries, raspberries, blackcurrants or blackberries
1 orange, juice and finely grated zest
